servinfo.title: Improper engine idling or engine fails to idle
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:M16A and J20A and Engine Basic Inspection:M16A and J20A .

condition.ptxt: Improper engine idling or engine fails to idle

ps.ptxt: Leaky or disconnected high-tension cord (for M16A engine)

ptxt.intxref: High-Tension Cord Removal and Installation (M16A):M16A and J20A
Ignition Coil Assembly (Including ignitor) Inspection:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Leaky manifold, throttle body, or cylinder head gasket

ptxt.intxref: EVAP Canister Purge Inspection:M16A and J20A
Fuel Injector Circuit Check:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Poor performance of ECT sensor or MAF sensor

action.ptxt: Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A

ptxt.intxref: Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

ptxt.intxref: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Loose connection or disconnection of vacuum hoses
Camshaft position control (VVT) system out of order (for M16A engine)
Faulty electric load parts (headlight, blower motor and/or rear defogger)

ptxt.intxref: Electric Load Signal Circuit Check:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Faulty electric load current sensor (for J20A engine)

ptxt.intxref: Electric Load Current Sensor On-Vehicle Inspection (J20A):M16A and J20A

action.ptxt: DTC P0620: Generator Control Circuit:M16A and J20A and DTC P0625 / P0626: Generator Field Terminal Circuit Low / High:M16A and J20A
